subject: Re: Update on intelligent Senior QS Font.
msgSnippet: Has anyone seen the QSJ Block font I created? I would welcome a detailed critique - or even a few observations. I used the trial period of a tool
messageBody:
Has anyone seen the "QSJ Block" font I created? I would welcome a
detailed critique - or even a few observations.
I used the trial period of a tool (Fontographer) to create it, and
will purchase it in a few months.

--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, Chuck Peck <chuck091956@y...> wrote:
> I also looked into font creation and found the same
> thing. Most of the abilities built into the current
> font format are not supported by most programs.
>
> What I thought would help in a new QS font most, would
> be better "kerning" and letter shape. Between the two
> of them I think we could get a font that would connect
> well and look good.
>
> Once we can get to that level other fonts from that
> base could be make.
>
> Chuck
